alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Armstrong; Beaver; Butler; Indiana; Washington; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued August 12 at 6:43PM EDT until August 12 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 634 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN OHIO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 11 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL OHIO BELMONT CARROLL COLUMBIANA COSHOCTON GUERNSEY HARRISON JEFFERSON OH MONROE MUSKINGUM NOBLE TUSCARAWAS IN PENNSYLVANIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST PENNSYLVANIA ALLEGHENY WASHINGTON WESTMORELAND IN WEST CENTRAL PENNSYLVANIA ARMSTRONG BUTLER INDIANA IN WESTERN PENNSYLVANIA BEAVER IN WEST VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE OF WEST VIRGINIA BROOKE HANCOCK MARSHALL OHIO THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALIQUIPPA, AMBRIDGE, BEAVER FALLS, BUTLER, CADIZ, CALDWELL, CAMBRIDGE, CANONSBURG, CARROLLTON, COLUMBIANA, COSHOCTON, DOVER, EAST LIVERPOOL, FOLLANSBEE, FORD CITY, GREENSBURG, INDIANA, KITTANNING, LATROBE, MARTINS FERRY, MONACA, MOUNDSVILLE, MURRYSVILLE, NEW KENSINGTON, NEW PHILADELPHIA, PITTSBURGH METRO AREA, SALEM, ST. CLAIRSVILLE, STEUBENVILLE, WASHINGTON, WEIRTON, WELLSBURG, WHEELING, WOODSFIELD, AND ZANESVILLE.
